With BuzziTrihex, the classic meeting table has been reimagined with corners that allow for optimal comfort.
Available in two sizes, one rounded and the other rectangular, the table can fit up to nine and 12 guests
respectively.

Gerd Couckhuyt—a Belgian-based designer known for his signature, linear interiors that value refined, modern
living—was inspired to create a meeting space that is highly-functional yet elegant.

“Whether you have three or nine guests at the round table, or four or 12 guests at the rectangluar table, this design gives everyone their own dedicated space,” said Couckhuyt.

The BuzziTrihex is made with an ash black base and an ash natural, ash black stained, ash white wash or ash walnut tabletop. The base is intentionally streamlined and subtle in its design to showcase the natural beauty of the wooden top.

The BuzziTrihex can be used in a private office, a meeting room or a hospitality suite.
